_comment: Guacamole Integration Configuration - TIESSE Matrix Network
_instructions: Edit this file to change Guacamole connection settings

server._comment: Guacamole server URL (change IP/port if needed)

credentials._comment: Admin user - used to CREATE connections (needs admin permissions)

viewerCredentials._comment: Viewer user - used to OPEN connections (limited permissions, no admin access)
viewerCredentials._instructions: Create this user in Guacamole with READ-only permissions on connections

connectionGroup._comment: Group name for Matrix-created connections in Guacamole
connectionGroup.name: Matrix Network Devices
